alert.note: Alert for Adair; Adams; Ringgold; Taylor; Union (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 04 at 4:53PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM CDT FOR WESTERN UNION...EASTERN ADAMS...NORTHWESTERN RINGGOLD...NORTHERN TAYLOR AND SOUTH CENTRAL ADAIR COUNTIES... At 453 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Gravity, or 7 miles north of Bedford, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Lenox around 505 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Prescott, Kent, Cromwell, Creston Municipal Airport, Creston, Green Valley Lake, Green Valley Lake State Park and Orient. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for south central and southwestern Iowa. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
